title: ANNOUNCEMENT: Discontinuing Patreon Shoutouts
itunes:title: ANNOUNCEMENT: Discontinuing Patreon Shoutouts
itunes:subtitle: Important Announcement:As of 13 March 2020 we will be retiring the name shout-out reward from our Rusty Knight and Rusty Noble tiers of the Patreon.
description:
Important Announcement:

As of 13 March 2020 we will be retiring the name shout-out reward from our Rusty Knight and Rusty Noble tiers of the Patreon.


If you have never been a Rusty Knight or Noble ($5 or upwards/month) and still want to have your name read out, you will need to be a Patron (or upgrade your membership if you’re a Rusty Citizen) by midnight GMT on Friday 13th March by visiting www.patreon.com/rustyquill


For more information, visit http://rustyquill.com/patreon-shout-outs-closing/


Join our community:

WEBSITE: rustyquill.com

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/therustyquill

TWITTER: @therustyquill

REDDIT: reddit.com/r/RustyQuill

EMAIL: mail@rustyquill.com

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
